layout.singingstanza: Man -- i -- fest, man -- i -- fest, man -- i -- fest, man -- i -- fest— God is man -- i -- fest in us, In the church, in the church, in the church, in the church— God's great mys -- t'ry, the church life glo -- ri -- ous! Vin -- di -- cat -- ed in Spir -- it, seen by an -- gels and men, Preached and be -- lieved in the na -- tions, And re -- ceived up in -- to glo -- ry.

lyrics.stanza: Manifest, manifest, manifest, manifest— God is manifest in us, In the church, in the church, in the church, in the church— God's great myst'ry, the church life glorious! Vindicated in Spirit, seen by angels and men, Preached and believed in the nations, And received up into glory.
